intent_atoms.description: Blocked tasks must be updated whenever blockers change to maintain day‑to‑day visibility.
Import licensed real‑world assets and refresh regression baselines so tolerant parsing and export scenarios can validate against real‑world payloads once licensing approvals are obtained.
Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures must be granted before importing assets.
Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark once macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture becomes available.
Benchmark must run with ISOINSPECTOR_BENCHMARK_PAYLOAD_BYTES=1073741824, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive them under Documentation/Performance/.
The todo.md entry "Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark" must remain open until the run completes and metrics are published.
Publish performance baselines for FoundationUI Phase 5.2 in PERFORMANCE.md after manual profiling with Xcode Instruments is completed.
Render times must be <100 ms, memory usage <5 MB, and Core Animation must verify 60 FPS on device during the manual profiling task.
Publish CI performance gates after completing multi‑platform benchmark tests for FoundationUI Phase 5.2.
Build time <10s for a clean build, binary size <500KB release, memory footprint <5MB per screen, 60 FPS on all platforms during interactions, and BoxTreePattern with 1000+ nodes must be verified.
Compile cross‑platform test results and create a cross‑platform report after manual testing on iOS, macOS, iPadOS devices and simulators.
Tests must cover iOS 17+ devices (iPhone SE/15/15 Pro Max), macOS 14+ multiple window sizes, iPadOS 17+ all size‑class orientations, Dark Mode, RTL languages, and multiple locales.
Achieve final accessibility sign‑off after manual VoiceOver, keyboard navigation, dynamic‑Type‑size‑to‑XXXL, etc., testing on real devices.
Accessibility score must be 98% or higher; manual edge‑case testing must confirm that all required accessibility features are implemented.

functional_units.name: Import Licensed Assets
functional_units.description: Import licensed media assets and refresh regression baselines for tolerant parsing and export scenarios

functional_units.name: Execute macOS 1 GiB Benchmark
functional_units.description: Run lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark on macOS with 1 GiB payload, collect runtime and RSS metrics, archive results

functional_units.name: Publish Performance Baselines
functional_units.description: Publish performance baseline data in PERFORMANCE.md after profiling

functional_units.name: Publish Performance Benchmarks
functional_units.description: Publish benchmark metrics after manual multi‑platform testing

functional_units.name: Compile Cross‑Platform Test Report
functional_units.description: Compile test results from iOS, macOS, and iPadOS devices into a cross‑platform report

functional_units.name: Final Accessibility Sign‑off
functional_units.description: Sign off on accessibility after completing manual VoiceOver, keyboard, dynamic type, and contrast tests
